content: We are so happy to open the doors again and welcome you all join the days with us! 🍸🍝 Our opening hours at the moment are: - Restaurant & Terrace open everyday 11-19... - Kitchen open 11-18 During the week we serve special lunch menu. On weekends we serve a la carte all day. Brunch will continue in May 🥞 We are also looking for new members to join the kitchen, if you are interested send your information to: info@harju8.fi See more
